thread.title_full: Man shot on Athol Street: Regina police - Regina | Globalnews.ca

author: Alexa Huffman
title: Man shot on Athol Street: Regina police - Regina | Globalnews.ca
text:
Listen 
Regina police are still investigating after a man was found with a gunshot wound on Athol Street Wednesday afternoon. 
According to police, a call came in at 3:30 p.m. reporting an injured person at a residence in the 1300 block of Athol Street. 
Officers found a man with a gunshot wound. He was taken to hospital by EMS with a non life-threatening injury. 
Regina police say a man was found with a gunshot wound in the 1300 block of Athol Street on Feb. 22. Sean Lerat-Stetner / Global News 
Police said the first steps were to get the other occupants of the house out. Officers set up a safety perimeter earlier in the afternoon and are still on scene investigating. 
Regina police have not located a weapon at this time and say it is not clear who may be a suspect. There were more than a dozen police cars on the 1300-block of Athol a few minutes ago, but most are gone now #yqr pic.twitter.com/ilGA7Pmgrl
